clinical_study.brief_title: Arthroscopic Wafer and Ulnar Shortening in Ulnar Abutment
clinical_study.official_title: Comparative Study Between Arthroscopic Wafer and Ulnar Shortening Osteotomy in Ulnar Abutment Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: there are many management options of ulnocarpal abutment depends on clinical evaluation and imaging of this joint. Arthroscopic treatment is the simplest solution for these conditions.

primary_outcome.description: follow up of the pain( nonpain,mild occasional, moderate and sever graded as 1,2,3,4 respectively
Range of motion of the wrist compared to the normal side(100 ,75-99,50-74,25-9,0-24%

arm_group.description: wafer group procedure using an arthroscope through portal(radial to extensor carpi ulnaris, debridement of triangular fibro-cartilage complex 3-4 mm is shaved from the dome of the ulna by 2.9 bur.

ulnar shortening group :this is the most logical technique, dorsoulnar incision is made on the distal one-third of the forearm then a 6 hole 3.5 mm Dcp plate is position,osteotomy using oscillating saw in z-shaped manner.

intervention.description: wrist arthroscopy and debridement of Triangular fibrocartilage and shortening of the head ulna by burr
wrist arthroscopy,debride debridement of Triangular fibrocartilage and shortening of the ulna by osteotomy and plate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- obvious ulnar abutment syndrome with ulnar side wrist pain
Exclusion Criteria:
- ulnar minus or neutral variance
- central and radial wrist pain
- osteoarthritis of the wrist.
